title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategies to Enhance Mobile Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device usage skills and intermediate-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Language learning program for managers/leaders, enhancing application skills through project-based activities in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can establish and implement learning plans by applying at least three self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies in mobile learning environments.
Recognize the advantages of learning flexibility and perform self-directed learning activities at least twice a week based on this understanding
Measure learning satisfaction through formative assessment and improve learning persistence intention by at least 20% by incorporating feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
